name: Zgr3d
summary: Zgr3d is an adaption of the DOS game Kret for the Amiga. The aim of the player is to destroy Tetris-like blocks that fall down from the top of the screen. With each move the whole line of blocks drops down one line unless it cannot go further because the composition of the game field does not allow it. The player needs to move carefully through the field destroying the blocks without being squashed.

name: Z-Grav: Clash
summary:
Z-Grav: Clash is the first Fly-â€˜n-Shoot battle royale built on Unreal Engine 5. Soar, grapple, and shoot anytime and anywhere in varied futuristic landscapes. Experience stunning graphics and easy-to-learn controls in unparalleled VR deathmatch. Get ready to Fly & Shoot your way to triumph!
The former name is Gravity Royale VR.

name: Zgirls
summary: Z-Girls is a strategic mobile game app available for android and iOS. You assume the role of the commander of a school situated in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by undead. Collecting resources, training your students, and battling undead and other schools alike, you slowly grow in strength, ready to take on the doomsday horde.

name: Zgadnij co to?
summary: A game that improves your creativity in which you solve puzzles in the form of pictures. Learn new phraseological connections and associations. Guess them all!

name: Z-Gyubaan!
summary: Destroy the floor panel with the blast that defeated the enemy and rescue the captive girl! After destroying 75% of the panels, move on to the next stage.
